alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 2:35AM CDT until June 02 at 1:20AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Derby affecting Sedgwick County. Arkansas River near Mulvane affecting Sedgwick and Sumner Counties. Arkansas River at Oxford affecting Sumner County. Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. For the Arkansas River...including Great Bend, Hutchinson, Haven, Derby, Mulvane, Oxford, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Derby. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river will be out of its main channel and expand to a width near 600 feet wide. Expect flooding of low-lying areas around the river. The Derby Park facility on the downstream east bank of the Market St bridge is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 13.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Arkansas River Derby 12.0 11.1 Wed 2 am CDT 8.4 4.7 3.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
